datasetParam.name: sample_id
datasetParam.help: Input a comma delimited set of Sample IDs, or upload a file. Wildcards (*) are allowed.

sqlQuery.name: MicrobiomeDatasets
sqlQuery.sql: select distinct dsp.name AS internal, dsp.name as term, display_name AS display from apidbTuning.DatasetPresenter dsp where dsp.name like 'otu_%_RSRC' order by display_name asc

sqlQuery.name: SamplesTaxon
sqlQuery.sql: select distinct protocol_app_node_id as internal, 'dataset' as ontology_term_name, cast(null as number) as number_value, cast(null as date) as date_value, ds.string_value from apidbTuning.TaxonAbundance ta, ( select distinct dsp.name AS dataset_name, display_name as string_value from apidbTuning.DatasetPresenter dsp where dsp.name like 'otu_%_RSRC') ds where ds.dataset_name = ta.dataset_name UNION select protocol_app_node_id as internal, term_id as ontology_term_name, cast(value as number) as number_value, cast(null as date) as date_value, cast(null as varchar2(1)) as string_value from apidbTuning.TaxonAbundance

sqlQuery.name: DatasetOntology
sqlQuery.sql: select 'IAO_0000100' AS ontology_term_name, 'dummy' as parent_ontology_term_name, 'Dataset' as display_name, 'Study name' as description, 'string' as type, cast(null as varchar2(1)) as units, 1 as precision, 0 as is_range from dual union select 'dummy' as ontology_term_name, null as parent_ontology_term_name, 'dummy' as display_name, null as description, null as type, null as units, null as precision, 0 as is_range from dual

sqlQuery.name: EnvFeatureOntology
sqlQuery.sql: select 'MiXS_env_feature' AS ontology_term_name, 'dummy' as parent_ontology_term_name, 'Environment' as display_name, 'Environment where the sample was collected' as description, 'string' as type, cast(null as varchar2(1)) as units, 1 as precision, 0 as is_range from dual union select 'dummy' as ontology_term_name, null as parent_ontology_term_name, 'dummy' as display_name, null as description, null as type, null as units, null as precision, 0 as is_range from dual

sqlQuery.name: DatasetMetaData
sqlQuery.sql: select distinct pan_id as internal, property_source_id as ontology_term_name, number_value, date_value, string_value from apidbtuning.metadata where property_source_id = 'IAO_0000100'

sqlQuery.name: EnvFeatureMetadata
sqlQuery.sql: select distinct pan_id as internal, property_source_id as ontology_term_name, number_value, date_value, string_value from apidbtuning.metadata where property_source_id = 'MiXS_env_feature' and pan_id in ($$datasets_filter$$)

sqlQuery.name: EnvFeatureMetadataBkg
sqlQuery.sql: select distinct pan_id as internal, property_source_id as ontology_term_name, number_value, date_value, string_value from apidbtuning.metadata where property_source_id = 'MiXS_env_feature'

sqlQuery.name: TaxonOntology
sqlQuery.sql: select distinct -- unneeded only because of UNION category as ontology_term_name, cast(null as varchar2(1)) as parent_ontology_term_name, category as display_name, 'taxonomic rank' as description, cast(null as varchar2(1)) as type, cast(null as varchar2(1)) as units, 1 as precision, 0 as is_range, taxon_level * 2 - 1 as ordering from apidbTuning.TaxonAbundance union select term_id as ontology_term_name, category as parent_ontology_term_name, term as display_name, cast(null as varchar2(1)) as description, 'number' as type, null as units, 1 as precision, 1 as is_range, taxon_level * 2 as ordering from apidbTuning.TaxonAbundance order by ordering, display_name

sqlQuery.name: SamplesTaxonWiz
sqlQuery.sql: select protocol_app_node_id as internal, term_id as ontology_term_name, cast(value as number) as number_value, cast(null as date) as date_value, cast(null as varchar2(1)) as string_value from apidbTuning.TaxonAbundance where protocol_app_node_id in ($$datasets_filter$$)

sqlQuery.name: SamplesTaxonBkgWiz
sqlQuery.sql: select protocol_app_node_id as internal, term_id as ontology_term_name, cast(value as number) as number_value, cast(null as date) as date_value, cast(null as varchar2(1)) as string_value from apidbTuning.TaxonAbundance

sqlQuery.name: SamplesTaxonSpec
sqlQuery.sql: select 'dummy' as ontology_term_name, null as parent_ontology_term_name, 'dummy' as display_name, null as description, null as type, null as units, null as precision, 0 as is_range, -1 as ordering from dual UNION select 'dataset' AS ontology_term_name, 'dummy' as parent_ontology_term_name, 'Dataset' as display_name, 'Study name' as description, 'string' as type, cast(null as varchar2(1)) as units, 1 as precision, 0 as is_range, 0 as ordering from dual UNION select 'Taxonomy' ontology_term_name, 'dummy' as parent_ontology_term_name, 'Taxonomy' as display_name, 'Taxonomy' as description, cast(null as varchar2(1)) as type, cast(null as varchar2(1)) as units, 1 as precision, 0 as is_range, 0.5 as ordering from dual UNION select distinct -- unneeded only because of UNION category as ontology_term_name, 'Taxonomy' as parent_ontology_term_name, category as display_name, 'taxonomic rank' as description, cast(null as varchar2(1)) as type, cast(null as varchar2(1)) as units, 1 as precision, 0 as is_range, taxon_level * 2 - 1 as ordering from apidbTuning.TaxonAbundance union select term_id as ontology_term_name, category as parent_ontology_term_name, term as display_name, cast(null as varchar2(1)) as description, 'number' as type, null as units, 1 as precision, 1 as is_range, taxon_level * 2 as ordering from apidbTuning.TaxonAbundance order by ordering, display_name

sqlQuery.name: SamplesMetadataWiz
sqlQuery.sql: select distinct pan_id as internal, property_source_id as ontology_term_name, string_value,number_value,date_value from apidbtuning.metadata where pan_id in ($$env_feature_filter$$)

sqlQuery.name: SamplesMetadata
sqlQuery.sql: select md.pan_id as internal, md.property as ontology_term_name, cast(case when pt.type = 'number' and apidb.is_number(md.value) = 1 then apidb.parse_and_round_number(md.value) else null end as number) as number_value, case when pt.type = 'string' then md.value else cast(null as varchar2(10)) end as string_value, cast(case when pt.type = 'date' then apidb.parse_date(md.value) else null end as date) as date_value from ( select pan_id, property, value from apidbtuning.InferredChars where dataset_name in ($$metadata_datasets$$) and pan_name not like '% [alpha_diversity] (OTU)' union select pan_id, property, value from apidbtuning.InferredParams where dataset_name in ($$metadata_datasets$$) and pan_name not like '% [alpha_diversity] (OTU)' union select pan_id, property, value from apidbtuning.DefaultChars where dataset_name in ($$metadata_datasets$$) and pan_name not like '% [alpha_diversity] (OTU)' ) md, (select property, max(type) as type from apidbTuning.PropertyType group by property) pt where pt.property = md.property

sqlQuery.name: MetadataSpec
sqlQuery.sql: select distinct ontology_term_name, parent_ontology_term_name, display_name, description, type, units, precision, is_range from apidbTuning.Ontology where dataset_name in ($$metadata_datasets$$)

sqlQuery.name: MetadataOntology
sqlQuery.sql: select distinct ontology_term_source_id as ontology_term_name, parent_ontology_term_source_id as parent_ontology_term_name, display_name, description, type, units, precision, is_range from apidbTuning.Ontology where ontology_term_source_id in ( select distinct property_source_id from apidbtuning.metadata where pan_id in ($$env_feature_filter$$) )
